Title: Rape accused from Bihar held
Content: A 19-year-old youth, who is an accused in the gang-rape and murder of a girl in Bihar’s Sitamarhi five years ago, was arrested on Tuesday.Escaped in 2014The accused, Arjun Mahto, escaped from custody
Author: Staff Reporter
Description: A 19-year-old youth, who is an accused in the gang-rape and murder of a girl in Bihar’s Sitamarhi five years ago, was arrested on Tuesday.Escaped in 2014The accused, Arjun Mahto, escaped from custody
